fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Outsider: You appear to not win with Order. 
- Soulbind: If you correctly guess X player’s true roles, disable their roles (passives and abilities) for 2 phases. One of them will die once the two phases are up.
- Whisperer: Learn 3 players and a role. One of them is that role. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Spirit Trap: Guess X player’s true roles. Cannot be publicly revealed roles. If you do not guess correctly within 2 tries, you die at the end of the phase. You will learn if you are correct at the end of the phase. [2 uses] 
- Hermit: Heal! yourself. [3 uses, 2 CD] 
- Abyssal Tunnel: Gain a non-special card of your choice. [2 uses, 2 CD] 
- Commune: Choose a player, and guess their role. You will learn at the end of the phase if you are correct, Influenceable. Gain a use every 3 players you outlive. [0 uses, 2 CD, Recharging, 0/3]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Correctly guess X player’s true roles before D5, where at least majority of them must be Order. *X = (# of Players/4, rounded)*
